channel.title: Arrange Mode - move to top/bottom [ADDED]
channel.description:
An idea for Arrange Mode - ability to send a block/line to the top or bottom of the draft.
Bonus points for providing a mechanism to move block/line to a certain section of the draft (eg, choose from a list of markdown headers to move the block/line under that header).
